titleStmt.title: Truth will out a sermon preached on the 20th of June, 1683, upon the discovery of the new plot / by a presbyter of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Presbyter of the Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Manhood and are to be sold by the booksellers of London,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained with loss of print; p. 31 misnumbered 64.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
